summary:
Rhaegar is my Nord character I recently started. As I was playing through Helgen, I kept looking at him and finally thought "I really like him!" Its nothing special, just thought I would upload him.

- The save are just as i exited helgen. I went with Hadvar and he is wearing Imperial light armour.
descriptionHtml:
When you load this save you will be just outside Helgen Keep. He will be wearing Imperial light armour, a Iron sword and a long bow (also arrows). I alson went with Hadvar but that dose not make to much difference.

To install just drop the saves into your saves folder located:
This PC/Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves.

If any one has any ideas to make this save better, please message me.

Required Mods:
NorthBorn Scars By Northborn: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?
author: Da1epic1panda
